alert.note: Alert for Lewis; Oswego (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued November 16 at 7:32PM EST by NWS Buffalo
info.description: ...A BAND OF HEAVY LAKE EFFECT SNOW WILL AFFECT PARTS OF OSWEGO AND SOUTHERN LEWIS COUNTIES... HAZARDS...A band of heavy lake effect snow will continue across central Oswego and southwest Lewis counties through mid evening. Snowfall rates will increase to 1 to 2 inches per hour in the strongest portion of the band. Travel will deteriorate, including Interstate 81 from Parish to Pulaski. The snow may mix with rain at times close to Lake Ontario. LOCATIONS IMPACTED INCLUDE... Oswego, Pulaski, Redfield, Hastings, Scriba, Richland, Palermo, New Haven, Minetto, Mexico, Williamstown, Orwell, Parish, Altmar and Osceola. This includes Interstate 81 between exits 33 and 36. SAFETY INFO... Conditions can deteriorate rapidly in winter weather situations. Be prepared for snow or ice covered roads. Slow down and allow extra time to reach your destination. &&
